ygData.subject: Re: Gamma and music
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh... I remember when I first fiddled with Gamma. And even if it doesn t help anyone-- it at least reminds of us stuff-- like how I need to go in and tweak my
ygData.messageBody:
Heh... I remember when I first fiddled with
Gamma. And even if it doesn't help anyone-- it at least
reminds of us stuff-- like how I need to go in and tweak
my colors some more so that I can read text in both
spell med and full screen modes. =)<br><br>It also
reminds me that many ppl don't know that they can remap
all the keys. Got a friend whome functions almost
fully on just the numpad and uses the left hand
entirely to target party members and drop down to cast
spells.<br>(Tempted to remap inventory and use item myself<br>so that
I could come close to that.)<br><br>I've remapped
my auto attack to the ` key. That's been SUCH a life
saver. I know ppl that remap the key to 'z' but I just
hit z by accident too much or know too many ppl with
z in their names. <br><br>shooman out<br><br>PS...
I've discovered Begging is a TOUGH trade skill to get
to go up... =). Maybe I'm biting off more than I can
chew doing, fishing, begging, tailoring, smithing, and
baking all at level 8. (25,5,0,21,1-- but lotsa food for
baking now and I've bought myself a large sewing kit.
Whooohoo. Spider hunting- here I come. 4 threads do not a 1
in tailoring make. LOL)
